sec.p: A shortened version of the First Organisational Climate/Culture Unified Search 93 (FOCUS-93) questionnaire by Van Muijen et al. [ 44] was used in this study. It consisted of 12 items using a 7-point Likert scale (ranging from 1 = ‘strongly disagree’ to 7 = ‘strongly agree’). The dimensions contained in the instrument were support, goals, innovation, and rules.
